biotools.summary: Biomedical Confident Itemsets Explanation (BioCIE) is a tool aiming at post-hoc explanation of black-box machine learning models for biomedical text classification. Using sources of domain knowledge and a confident itemset mining method, BioCIE discretizes the decision space of a black-box into smaller subspaces and extracts semantic relationships between the input text and class labels in different subspaces.

bioschemas.name: BioCIE
